description: Detects a when net.exe is called with a password in the command line Author: Tim Shelton (HAWK.IO). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Password Provided In Command Line Of Net.exe
query: ((process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\net.exe" AND process.command_line:*net* AND process.command_line:*\ use\ * AND process.command_line:*\:*\\\* AND process.command_line:*\/USER\:*\ *) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:*\ ))))
